description: Main orders table with status and delivery information

columns.name: order_status
columns.description: Status of the order (delivered, shipped, etc.)

columns.name: order_purchase_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the order was purchased

columns.name: order_approved_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the order was approved

columns.name: order_delivered_carrier_date
columns.description: Date when order was delivered to carrier

columns.name: order_delivered_customer_date
columns.description: Date when order was delivered to customer

columns.name: order_estimated_delivery_date
columns.description: Estimated delivery date for the order
